content:
/>
X.i.2.B.1.a
.
Initial Actions to Take Upon Receipt of an FDC
Identify a fully developed claim (FDC) by attaching the
Fully Developed Claim
special issue indicator to
at least one contention
within the FDC claim.
References
:  For more information on
choosing an appropriate end product (EP), see
M21-4, Appendix B
, and
establishing an EP in the appropriate system, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 3.A.1
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Processing Fully Developed Claims (FDCs)
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
